descriptionHtml:
[size=3][u][b]What This Mod Do:[/b]
[/u][/size]This is simply a mod for those who like the idea of ridiculously over powered armor. It chances the Blacksmith's elixir potion in game to so that you can improve weapons and armor by 500% instead of 50.
[size=3][b][u]

Installation:[/u][/b][/size]

Just add the esp to your data folder. Couldn't be simpler. 
[size=3][b][u]
Compatibility:
[/u][/b][/size]
Obviously it won't be compatible with anything that already changes that potion's effects. Other than that, it should be compatible with anything. If you find something it doesn't work with, please tell me and I'll be happy to update the description.
author: Lordmonk3y
